渡り烏: (ワタリガラス) - common raven (Corvus corax)
渡り箸: (わたりばし) - using one's chopsticks to jump from side dish to side dish without pausing to eat rice in between (a breach of etiquette)
渡り蟹: (ワタリカニ) - swimming crab (Portunus trituberculatus); Japanese blue crab
渡り間: (わたりま) - distance between two points; distance between opposite supports of arch, bridge; span
渡り鳥: (わたりどり) - migratory bird; bird of passage
渡る: (わたる) - (usu. 渡る or 渉る) to cross over/to go across; (usu. 亘る or 亙る)  to extend/to cover/to range/to span
渡る世間に鬼はない: (わたるせけんにおにはない) - all people aren't evil; don't distrust everyone; there is kindness to be found everywhere
渡る世間に鬼は無い: (わたるせけんにおにはない) - all people aren't evil; don't distrust everyone; there is kindness to be found everywhere
渡世人: (とせいにん) - gambler; yakuza; person without a legitimate job
渡中: (とちゅう) - going to China; moving to China
渡伊: (とい) - going to Italy; moving to Italy
渡伯: (とはく) - going to Brazil; moving to Brazil
渡信天翁: (ワタリアホウドリ) - wandering albatross (Diomedea exulans)
渡加: (とか) - going to Canada; moving to Canada
渡印: (といん) - going to India; moving to India
渡台: (とたい) - going to Taiwan; moving to Taiwan
渡唐: (ととう) - visiting China; going to China
渡場: (わたしば) - ferry landing; point of departure or arrival for ferries
渡御: (とぎょ) - transferral of a sacred object from its place of enshrinement; imperial procession
渡星: (とせい) - going to Singapore; moving to Singapore
渡来人: (とらいじん) - people from overseas, especially from China and Korea, who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese
渡来神: (とらいしん) - deity that originated on the Asian mainland, particulalry the Korean Peninsula, during the Yayoi or Kofun Periods (e.g. Ame no Hiboko)
渡殿: (わたりどの) - roofed corridor connecting two buildings (in traditional palatial-style architecture)
渡比: (とひ) - going to the Philippines; moving to the Philippines; migration to the Philippines
渡瀬地鼠: (ワタセジネズミ) - lesser Ryukyu shrew (Crocidura watasei); Watase's shrew
渡烏: (ワタリガラス) - common raven (Corvus corax)
渡独: (とどく) - going to Germany; moving to Germany
渡米: (とべい) - going to USA; going to America
渡蟹: (ワタリカニ) - swimming crab (Portunus trituberculatus); Japanese blue crab
渡西: (とせい) - going to Spain; moving to Spain
渡豪: (とごう) - going to Australia; moving to Australia
渡韓: (とかん) - going to South Korea; moving to South Korea
渡鴉: (ワタリガラス) - common raven (Corvus corax)
渦: (ka/uzu) - whirlpool , whirlpool, swirl, eddy, vortex, maelstrom
渦中: (kachuu) - vortex, maelstrom, whirlpool; (no meio de um) scandal, controversy, quarrel, turmoil
渦巻き形ガスケット: (うずまきがたガスケット) - spiral-wound gasket; spiral gasket
渦巻き模様: (うずまきもよう) - whirling or spiral pattern
渦巻く: (uzumaku) - to whirl, to eddy, to swirl, to curl (smoke); to be all jumbled together (sentimentos, pensamentos, etc.) , to whirl, to eddy, to swirl, to curl (smoke); to be all jumbled together (feelings, thoughts, etc.); to surge, to sweep
渦巻形ガスケット: (うずまきがたガスケット) - spiral-wound gasket; spiral gasket
渦巻星雲: (うずまきせいうん) - spiral nebula
渦流: (かりゅう) - swirling current/eddy/whirlpool/vortex/maelstrom; eddy current
渦流ファン: (かりゅうファン) - regenerative fan; vortex flow fan
渦流ブロワ: (かりゅうブロワ) - regenerative blower; vortex flow blower
渦流形センサ: (かりゅうがたセンサ) - vortex sensor
渦流形素子: (かりゅうけいそし) - vortex device
渦状銀河: (うずじょうぎんが) - spiral galaxy
渦線: (かせん) - spiral line; line vortex; vortex line; circumvolution
渦鞭毛藻類: (うずべんもうそうるい) - dinoflagellates
温々: (ぬくぬく) - comfortably; snugly; cosily; easy; carefree
温い: (ぬくい) - (温い, 微温い only)  (ぬくい is primarily used in Western Japan) lukewarm/tepid; (ぬるい only)   lenient; (ぬくい only)    slow/stupid
温かい: (あったかい) - (暖かい, 暖い usu. refer to air temperature) warm; mild; genial
温かい御飯: (あたたかいごはん) - warm rice
温かい歓迎: (あたたかいかんげい) - warm reception; cordial welcome; warm greeting
